Html:
First, thanks much for this library. I'm new to it but it looks great so far.

Second, we have a requirement to split (unbundle) a file that may include multiple ISA's with multiple GS's into multiple files that each contain a single ISA\GS. There are methods for unbundling by transaction and by loop, but no UnbundleByFunctionGroup(). Any chance we could see that method in a future release?

Thanks!
Tom
